## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
devtools::install_github("araezopsis/bstringr")
```

## Usage

```{r}
library(bstringr)
```

```{r}
# bstr object
temp <- bstr(letters[1:5])
print.default(temp)

# print method for bstr
print(temp)

# c method for bstr
c(temp, temp)

# [ method for bstr
temp[c(1,2,4)]
rev(temp)
head(temp)
tail(temp)
```

```{r}
dstr("ATGC")
```
